cl.name: Rogue
cl.desc: agile and tricky, relying on precision and debilitating opponents

abs.name: Shiv
abs.desc: A quick, precise stab that deals 20 physical damage.

abs.name: Backstab
abs.desc: Strike a vital point and deal 35 points of physical damage.

abs.name: Focus
abs.desc: Take a moment to concentrate, restoring your mental energy. Restores 10 EP.

abs.name: Smoke Bomb
abs.desc: Throw a smoke bomb, making you harder to hit. You have a 50% chance of evading any incoming attacks in the current round.

abs.name: Sneak Attack
abs.desc: You rely on your agility to evade your opponent, taking no damage from any of their attacks, while you deal 45 physical damage to them.

charAbs.name: Shiv
charAbs.desc: A quick, precise stab that deals 20 physical damage.

charAbs.name: Backstab
charAbs.desc: Strike a vital point and deal 35 points of physical damage.

charAbs.name: Smoke Bomb
charAbs.desc: Throw a smoke bomb, making you harder to hit. You have a 50% chance of evading any incoming attacks in the current round.

cl.name: Warrior
cl.desc: tough, focusing on direct combat and robust defense

abs.name: Cleave
abs.desc: A sweeping strike that deals 20 physical damage.

abs.name: Shield Bash
abs.desc: Slam your shield into the opponent, dealing 35 physical damage.

abs.name: Ironclad Defense
abs.desc: Brace yourself, effectively taking no damage for the current round.

abs.name: Bloodlust
abs.desc: Tap into your inner fury, restoring a small amount of health. Restores 30 HP.

abs.name: Rallying Cry
abs.desc: Let out a powerful shout, inspiring yourself and recovering 12 EP.

charAbs.name: Shield Bash
charAbs.desc: Slam your shield into the opponent, dealing 35 physical damage.

charAbs.name: Rallying Cry

charAbs.name: Focus
charAbs.desc: Take a moment to concentrate, restoring your mental energy. Restores 10 EP.

charAbs.name: Backstab
charAbs.desc: Strike a vital point and deal 35 points of physical damage.

charAbs.name: Defend
charAbs.desc: The character takes on a defensive stance and takes only half damage.

charAbs.name: Recharge
charAbs.desc: The character does nothing during the round but regains 5 EP.
